participant_1.background:
I do not have kids because I enjoy my quiet life with my cat.
i like to wear black.
I am proud of my passion for swimming and how it has helped me to stay healthy and active.
I am a baker trying to find my way in life.
i have a brown belt in karate.

participant_2.background:
I grow my own vegetables and take daily walks.
I start my day with a cup of coffee and a walk through Central Park.
i wear glasses.
I am a hard worker who is passionate about my hobbies.
I've kept my love of horror movies from my parents.

content.text: Hi there!  How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I'm about to head out for a walk in Central Park.
That sounds lovely! I love walking in Central Park.
It's my favorite place to relax. I do it every day when I'm in town.
That's great! I'm more of a homebody, but I love taking walks when I can.
I love that. I wish I could be more of a homebody, but I have so much energy.
I hear you. I work as a baker, so I'm on my feet all day long.
That's impressive! I've always admired bakers.
It can be tough, but it's also really rewarding. I love creating delicious pastries.
I bet! I love pastries. Do you have a favorite type?
I love chocolate chip cookies! What's your favorite?
I love chocolate chip cookies too! But I also love apple pie.
Apple pie is delicious! I love the way the crust gets all flaky.
Me too! I love baking, but I'm not very good at it.
Don't worry! Everyone has to start somewhere.
